@Tim 'mithro' Ansell @Ethan Mahintorabi afaik Andreas Andreou (from John Hopkins) and Shantanu Chakrabartty groups are working together on a new open-source DVS sensor. They plan to tapeout on 130nm.

It is part of annual Telluride Neuromorphic Workshop.
